name: Aggregate Root Pattern
desc: Pattern for creating ABP aggregate roots

rules.noInfrastructure: Cannot reference EF Core, ASP.NET, or infrastructure
rules.invariants: Must enforce business invariants in methods

constructors.desc: Constructor with required parameters for creating new aggregate

methods.name: Business methods
methods.example: public void UpdateStatus(Status newStatus) { /* enforce invariants */ }

example.snippet: public class NotificationLogEntity : AggregateRoot<Guid>, IHasCreationTime, IMultiTenant { public DateTime CreationTime { get; set; } public Guid? TenantId { get; set; } // ... business properties }
